targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "uptime")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${hoststorage}")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")  
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)  
|> filter(fn: (r) =>    r.host == "${hoststorage}" and     r._measurement == "system" and    r._field == "n_cpus")  
|> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)  
|> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")  
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)  
|> filter(fn: (r) =>    r.host == "${hoststorage}" and     r._measurement == "mem" and    r._field == "total")  
|> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)  
|> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)  |> filter(fn: (r) =>    r.nodeID == "${storageID}" and     r._measurement == "storage" and    r._field == "isResponding")  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)  |> yield(name: "last")  |> keep(columns: ["_time","_value"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")  
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)  
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "processes")  
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total_threads")  
|> filter(fn: (r) =>  r.host == "${hoststorage}")  
|> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)  
|> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "processes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${hoststorage}")
  |> last()
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "_field", "_start", "_stop", "time", "host"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "load1" or r["_field"] == "n_cpus")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${hoststorage}")
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with n_cpus: float(v: r.n_cpus)}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with load1_percore: r.load1 / r.n_cpus}))
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "load1", "n_cpus", "host", "_start", "_stop"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "load5" or r["_field"] == "n_cpus")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${hoststorage}")
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with n_cpus: float(v: r.n_cpus)}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with load5_percore: r.load5 / r.n_cpus}))
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "load5", "n_cpus", "host", "_start", "_stop"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "load15" or r["_field"] == "n_cpus")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${hoststorage}")
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with n_cpus: float(v: r.n_cpus)}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with load15_percore: r.load15 / r.n_cpus}))
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "load15", "n_cpus", "host", "_start", "_stop"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "available_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>  r.host == "${hoststorage}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> drop(fn: (column) => column =~ /^_(start|stop)/)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with usedmemory: 100.0 - r.available_percent}))
  |> drop(fn: (column) => column =~ /available_percent/)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)    |> filter(fn: (r) => r.nodeID == "${storageID}" and r._measurement == "storageTargets" and r._field == "diskSpaceTotal")    |> group(columns: ["storageTargetID"])    |> last()    |> group()    |> keep(columns: ["_value", "storageTargetID"])    |> rename(columns: {_value: "Total Space"})

from(bucket: "${bucket}")    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)    |> filter(fn: (r) => r.nodeID == "${storageID}" and r._measurement == "storageTargets" and r._field == "diskSpaceFree")    |> group(columns: ["storageTargetID"])    |> last()    |> group()    |> keep(columns: ["_value", "storageTargetID"])    |> rename(columns: {_value: "Free Space"})

from(bucket: "${bucket}")    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)    |> filter(fn: (r) => r.nodeID == "${storageID}" and r._measurement == "storageTargets" and r._field == "targetConsistencyState")    |> group(columns: ["storageTargetID"])    |> last()    |> group()    |> keep(columns: ["_value", "storageTargetID"])    |> rename(columns: {_value: "State"})

from(bucket: "${bucket}")  
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)  
|> filter(fn: (r) =>    r.nodeID == "${storageID}" and     r._measurement == "highResStorage" and    r._field == "netRecvBytes")  
|> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)  
|> yield(name: "max")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")  
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)  
|> filter(fn: (r) =>    r.nodeID == "${storageID}" and     r._measurement == "highResStorage" and    r._field == "netSendBytes")
|> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)  
|> yield(name: "max")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")  
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)  
|> filter(fn: (r) =>    r.nodeID == "${storageID}" and     r._measurement == "highResStorage" and    r._field == "workRequests")
|> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)  
|> yield(name: "max")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)  |> filter(fn: (r) =>    r.nodeID == "${storageID}" and     r._measurement == "highResStorage" and    r._field == "queuedRequests")  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)  |> yield(name: "max")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")  
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)  
|> filter(fn: (r) =>    r.nodeID == "${storageID}" and     r._measurement == "highResStorage" and    r._field == "diskReadBytes")  
|> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)  |> yield(name: "max")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")  
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)  
|> filter(fn: (r) =>    r.nodeID == "${storageID}" and     r._measurement == "highResStorage" and    r._field == "diskWriteBytes")  
|> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)  |> yield(name: "max")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")  
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)  
|> filter(fn: (r) => r.nodeID == "${storageID}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "storage")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "diskSpaceTotal" or r._field == "diskSpaceFree")  
|> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)  
|> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r.diskSpaceTotal - r.diskSpaceFree }))
|> rename(columns: {_value: "diskSpaceUsed"})

from(bucket:  "${bucket}")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disk")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${hoststorage}" )
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used_percent")
    |> last()
    |> group()
    |> keep(columns: ["device", "path", "_value"])
    |> rename(columns: {"device": "Device", "path": "Path", "_value": "Used Percent"})

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "diskio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${hoststorage}" and r.name =~ /$disk$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "read_bytes")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(unit: 10s, nonNegative: true)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket:  "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "diskio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${hoststorage}" and r.name =~ /$disk$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "write_time")
  |> derivative(unit: 10s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")  
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)  
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")  
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "load1" or r["_field"] == "load5" or r["_field"] == "load15")  
|> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${hoststorage}")  
|> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)  
|> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage_user" or r["_field"] == "usage_system" or r["_field"] == "usage_iowait")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${hoststorage}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")  
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)  
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "processes")  
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "running" or r["_field"] == "blocked" or r["_field"] == "sleeping" or r["_field"] == "stopped" or r["_field"] == "zombies")  
|> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${hoststorage}")  
|> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)  
|> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")  
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)  
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu")  
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage_idle")  
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["cpu"] =~ /cpu[0-9].*/)  
|> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${hoststorage}")  
|> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)  
|> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")  
|> drop(fn: (column) => column =~ /^_(start|stop)/)  
|> map(fn: (r) => ({r with usage_idle: 100.0 - r.usage_idle}))

from(bucket: "${bucket}")  
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart)  
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${hoststorage}")  
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mem")  
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "available" or r._field == "buffered" or r._field == "free" or r._field == "cached" or r._field == "used" or r._field == "total" or r._field == "mapped" )  
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)  
  |> yield(name: "mean")

list.definition: from(bucket: "${bucket}")  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)  |> filter(fn: (r) =>    r.nodeID == "${storageID}" and     r._measurement == "storage" and    r._field == "hostnameid")  |> last()
list.name: hoststorage
list.query: from(bucket: "${bucket}")  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)  |> filter(fn: (r) =>    r.nodeID == "${storageID}" and     r._measurement == "storage" and    r._field == "hostnameid")  |> last()
